mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_spos_base.select */ SELECT spos_no /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */ ,spos_nm /* spos_nm 배우자_명 character varying(20) */ ,spos_tel_no /* spos_tel_no 배우자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */ ,sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,hght_val /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ ,wght_val /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ ,race_div_cd /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM tm_spos_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND spos_no = #{sposNo} /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_spos_base.insert */ INSERT INTO tm_spos_base ( spos_no /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */
,spos_nm /* spos_nm 배우자_명 character varying(20) */
,spos_tel_no /* spos_tel_no 배우자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,hght_val /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */
,wght_val /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */
,race_div_cd /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{sposNo} /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */
,#{sposNm} /* spos_nm 배우자_명 character varying(20) */
,#{sposTelNo} /* spos_tel_no 배우자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,#{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{hghtVal} /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */
,#{wghtVal} /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */
,#{raceDivCd} /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_spos_base.update */ UPDATE tm_spos_base
,spos_nm = #{sposNm} /* spos_nm 배우자_명 character varying(20) */
,spos_tel_no = #{sposTelNo} /* spos_tel_no 배우자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,hght_val = #{hghtVal} /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */
,wght_val = #{wghtVal} /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */
,race_div_cd = #{raceDivCd} /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND spos_no = #{sposNo} /* spos_no 배우자_번호 num\eric */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_spos_base.merge */ INSERT INTO tm_spos_base ( spos_no /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */
,spos_nm /* spos_nm 배우자_명 character varying(20) */
,spos_tel_no /* spos_tel_no 배우자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,hght_val /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */
,wght_val /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */
,race_div_cd /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{sposNo} /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */
,#{sposNm} /* spos_nm 배우자_명 character varying(20) */
,#{sposTelNo} /* spos_tel_no 배우자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,#{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{hghtVal} /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */
,#{wghtVal} /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */
,#{raceDivCd} /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
,spos_nm = #{sposNm} /* spos_nm 배우자_명 character varying(20) */
,spos_tel_no = #{sposTelNo} /* spos_tel_no 배우자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,hght_val = #{hghtVal} /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */
,wght_val = #{wghtVal} /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */
,race_div_cd = #{raceDivCd} /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_spos_base.delete */ DELETE FROM tm_spos_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND spos_no = #{sposNo} /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */
